1409.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And the Day|102|112|819$يَحْشُرُهُمْ|He will gather them,|153|174|6028$كَأَن|as if|57|78|4179$لَّمْ يَلْبَثُوٓاْ|they had not remained|170|191|8167$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$سَاعَةً|an hour|73|84|6369$مِّنَ|of|50|72|156$ٱلنَّهَارِ|the day,|76|120|2743$يَتَعَارَفُونَ|they will recognize each other|220|264|8168$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|between them.|120|164|1056$قَدْ|Certainly,|83|105|1097$خَسِرَ|(will have) lost|118|125|4478$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$كَذَّبُواْ|denied|73|88|2650$بِلِقَآءِ|the meeting|99|114|5524$ٱللَّهِ|(with) Allah,|101|116|2$وَمَا|and not|71|86|46$كَانُواْ|they were|87|94|94$مُهْتَدِينَ|the guided ones.|131|131|135$

1411.verse: وَلِكُلِّ|And for every|110|125|6366$أُمَّةٍ|nation|61|91|3159$رَّسُولٌ‌ۖ|(is) a Messenger.|135|165|839$فَإِذَا|So when|77|107|1730$جَآءَ|comes|62|92|4023$رَسُولُهُمْ|their Messenger,|130|145|8173$قُضِىَ|it will be judged|124|133|8174$بَيْنَهُم|between them|115|133|1056$بِٱلْقِسْطِ|in justice,|86|104|2700$وَهُمْ|and they|79|97|256$لَا|(will) not|79|97|30$يُظْلَمُونَ|be wronged.|102|111|2730$

1414.verse: قُلْ|Say,|50|56|765$أَرَءَيْتُمْ|"Do you see,|104|117|5597$إِنْ|if|44|57|225$أَتَـٰكُمْ|comes to you|110|123|5573$عَذَابُهُۥ|His punishment|119|132|8177$بَيَـٰتًا|(by) night|86|99|6248$أَوْ|or|41|54|154$نَهَارًا|(by) day,|82|88|8103$مَّاذَا|what (portion)|116|174|271$يَسْتَعْجِلُ مِنْهُ|of it would (wish to) hasten|205|320|8178$ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ|the criminals?"|124|182|7155$

1415.verse: أَثُمَّ|Is (it) then|93|109|8179$إِذَا مَا|when|74|107|5236$وَقَعَ|(it had) occurred|133|166|4379$ءَامَنتُم|you (will) believe|132|165|1242$بِهِۦٓ‌ۚ|in it?|52|85|204$ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ|Now?|78|94|8180$وَقَدْ|And certainly|107|188|2117$كُنتُم|you were|81|244|214$بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ|seeking to hasten it.|162|243|8181$

1416.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|60|293$قِيلَ|it will be said|106|120|97$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|122|750$ظَلَمُواْ|wronged,|81|95|558$ذُوقُواْ|"Taste|75|89|3558$عَذَابَ|punishment|95|109|1786$ٱلْخُلْدِ|the everlasting.|124|131|8182$هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ|Are you (being) recompensed|215|229|8183$إِلَّا|except|65|93|86$بِمَا|for what|76|104|43$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|139|214$تَكْسِبُونَ|earn?"|97|111|5415$

1407.verse: And among them are those who look at you. But can you guide the blind although they will not [attempt to] see?

1408.verse: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all, but it is the people who are wronging themselves.

1409.verse: And on the Day when He will gather them, [it will be] as if they had not remained [in the world] but an hour of the day, [and] they will know each other. Those will have lost who denied the meeting with Allah and were not guided

1410.verse: And whether We show you some of what We promise them, [O Muhammad], or We take you in death, to Us is their return; then, [either way], Allah is a witness concerning what they are doing

1411.verse: And for every nation is a messenger. So when their messenger comes, it will be judged between them in justice, and they will not be wronged

1412.verse: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"

1413.verse: Say, "I possess not for myself any harm or benefit except what Allah should will. For every nation is a [specified] term. When their time has come, then they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it]."

1414.verse: Say, "Have you considered: if His punishment should come to you by night or by day - for which [aspect] of it would the criminals be impatient?"

1415.verse: Then is it that when it has [actually] occurred you will believe in it? Now? And you were [once] for it impatient

1416.verse: Then it will be said to those who had wronged, "Taste the punishment of eternity; are you being recompensed except for what you used to earn?"

1417.verse: And they ask information of you, [O Muhammad], "Is it true?" Say, "Yes, by my Lord. Indeed, it is truth; and you will not cause failure [to Allah]."
